title: snowflake.core.alert.AlertResource | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Represents a reference to a Snowflake Alert resource.

With this alert reference, you can create, update, delete, and fetch information about alerts, as well
as perform certain actions on them.

if_exists (bool, optional) – Check the existence of this alert before drop.
The default value is False.
